channel.title: Sidebar 7?
channel.description:
Wanting to open the tab next to the friends' list...And my friend tells me that it is sidebar 7.
How would I make this openable...?

item.title: Sidebar 7?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Actually. It was server sided.

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“setcase”)) {
int case2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8));

        println_debug("Packet: " + case2);
        packetType = case2;
        parseIncomingPackets();
    } else if (command.startsWith("setbutton")) {
        int case2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10));

        println_debug("ID: " + case2);
        packetType = 185;
        parseIncomingPackets();
        actionButtonId = case2;
        actionset = true;
    } else if (command.startsWith("sidebar")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Setsuna")) {
        int which = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8));

        setSidebarInterface(7, which);
        sendMessage("Sidebar interface set to " + which + "...");
    } else if (command.startsWith("setsb")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Setsuna")) {
        int newsb = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));



        sb = newsb;
        sendMessage("Sidebar = " + sb);
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sbloop")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Setsuna")) {
        sbloop = true;
        sbscan = false;
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sbfast")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Setsuna")) {
        sbloop = true;
        sbscan = true;[/code]

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); if (ancients == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); } if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); } setSidebarInterface(7, 553); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); setSidebarInterface(11, 904); setSidebarInterface(12, 147); setSidebarInterface(13, 12855); setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);
